spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent spatial translation. Room placements and wall alignments are precise. Door swings are correctly maintained. Subtle text modification noted in Bedroom-1 dimensions.

structural_fidelity.notes: Highly consistent wall thickness and adjacency mapping. All rooms, including toilets and utility areas, are correctly represented. Minor visual merging in the utility/toilet-1 shaft area.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement and scaling are identical to the source 2D plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean 2.5D top-down render. High visual clarity and consistent lighting. Effectively differentiates wall heights and floor textures.

detected_errors.description: Text labels for Bedroom-1 dimensions changed from 16'5' x 14'6' to 13'6' x 14'8' despite geometry remaining largely accurate.
Minor rendering artifacts in the plumbing shaft/ventilation voids where textures appear significantly darker/filled compared to the open 2D representation.
